level.heading: Appointment and duties of Registrar.
level.text: The Director of the Department of Health shall appoint the Registrar who shall:
Be in charge of administering the vital records system and be the custodian of its records; and
Develop and distribute forms or other means for transmitting data to carry out the reporting and registration purposes of this chapter.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 1-608.01 and § 7-228.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 14-299 substituted "Department of Health" for "Department of Human Services".

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 4-34
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-34, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-201.
